member.name: T:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLDriver
member.summary: Driver class

member.name: M:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLDriver.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main functionality
member.param: The arguments to be passed in.

member.name: T:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions
member.summary: This class stores the command line arguments that are taken in, both mandatory and optional

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.Examples
member.summary: Gets usage for SeleniumPerfXML

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.Browser
member.summary: Gets or sets the browser set in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.Environment
member.summary: Gets or sets the environment set in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.URL
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL set in the XML. By default, the URL is derived by the environment provided.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.RespectRepeatFor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to respect RespectRepeatFor flag in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.RespectRunAodaFlag
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to respect RunAODAFlag in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.TimeOutThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout threshold in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.WarningThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the warning threshold in the XML. Warning must be less than Timeout.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.DataFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the datafile in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.CSVSaveFileLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSV file location in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.LogSaveLocation
member.summary:
Gets or sets the log save location in the XML.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.ScreenShotSaveLocation
member.summary:
Gets or sets the screenshot save location in the XML.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.XMLFile
member.summary:
Gets or sets the screenshot save location in the XML.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.name: T:SeleniumPerfXML.TestDataXMLParser
member.summary: XMLParser that reads the XML passed in to create proper data structurs.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The file path to the XML file.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.TestDataXMLParser.Browser
member.summary: Gets or sets the browser to use in this test.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.TestDataXMLParser.Environment
member.summary: Gets or sets the environment to go to.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.TestDataXMLParser.URL
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL the browser should land on first.

member.summary: Gets or sets the passed in respectRunAODAFlag parameter.

member.summary: Gets or sets the passed in respectRepeatFor parameter.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.TestDataXMLParser.TimeOutThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout threshold.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.TestDataXMLParser.WarningThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the warning threshold. Note that the warning threshold should be less than the timeout threshold.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.TestDataXMLParser.DataFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to the data file.

member.summary: Gets or sets the csv save file location.

member.summary: Gets or sets the log save file location.

member.summary: Gets or sets the screenshot save location.

member.summary: Gets or sets the XML file.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to respectRunAODAFlag or not.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to respectRepeatFor or not.

member.summary: This function is responsible for parsing parameters in the XML File and updating variables if not overriden.
